Crime_Name: Judicial Review of Immigration Officer's Decision
Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer breached procedural fairness by relying on undisclosed extrinsic evidence
Evidence_Assessment: Immigration officer conducted an internet search on services in Mexico without disclosure
Legal_Rule: Procedural fairness requires disclosure of novel and significant information to applicants
Procedural_Issue: Failure to disclose extrinsic evidence to applicants
Grounds_for_Claim: Procedural unfairness, reliance on speculative findings
Outcome_on_Merits: Case remitted for re-examination by a different officer
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Violation of procedural fairness due to non-disclosure
Key_Evidence_Considered: Internet-sourced information about services in Mexico
Applicant_Challenge: Challenged decision based on procedural unfairness and use of undisclosed evidence
